Presley Chweneyagae (a mụrụ n'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1984 na North West Province Mafikeng, South Africa) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri nke sitere na Tswana. Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Tsotsi, nke meriri Academy Award for Foreign Language Film na 78th Academy Awards.  Nne ya, Agnes Keagile kpọrọ ya aha onye ọbụ abụ kachasị amasị ya, Elvis Presley
Ọ bụ ezie na o meela ihe nkiri n'oge gara aga, Tsotsi bụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya
Ọrụ ya kachasị ọhụrụ bụ na telenovela South Africa, The River dịka Thuso "Cobra" Mokoena
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ na-elekwasị anya na egwuregwu na ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ
Ihe nkiri ya kachasị ọhụrụ gụnyere More Than Just a Game, State of Violence na Africa United
Ọ na-eme egwuregwu ugbu a banyere Solomon Mahlangu, onye bụbu MK cadre nke a kwụgidere mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na abụọ.
